snippet.title: The Songbird Guild - Gameplay Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
The Songbird Guild is planned for release sometime in 2025 for PC, Mac, and Linux.

WISHLIST ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1238940/The_Songbird_Guild/

A yuri RPG/Visual Novel hybrid about magical girls falling in love. Investigate the secrets of a corrupt fantasy world and fight creepy (yet somehow adorable?) monsters in turn-based battles, all to pay the bills in this world where being a magical girl is a regular 9-5 job.

Visit the Yurisoft website: https://www.yurisoftgames.com/
